title: [1508521049] Farfalle with Ricotta, Pancetta & Peas - Gordon Ramsay
description:
Farfalle, otherwise known as "bow-tie pasta", is ideal for sticking to sauces. Combined here with smoked chunks of bacon, garlic, peas, crème fraîche and ricotta cheese to make a delightfully simple dish you can prepare at home in just 12 minutes.

Subscribe for weekly cooking videos. 

If you liked this clip check out the rest of Gordon's channels:

http://www.youtube.com/gordonramsay
http://www.youtube.com/kitchennightmares
http://www.youtube.com/thefword
